TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWrappedMember

summary.span: 定義方法，以存取定義成員所在的物件。

span.span: Defines methods for accessing the object that a member is defined on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個包裝物件都會包含一個成員 (欄位、屬性或方法) 的資訊，連同成員定義所在之具現化物件的複本。Each wrapped object contains the information for one member (field, property, or method), together with a copy of the instantiated object that the member is defined on. 這樣可讓其他未包含成員的物件進行儲存，然後就像傳回自己的值一般傳回其值。This enables other objects that do not contain the member to store it and then return its value as if it were their own.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetWrappedObject() cil managed

summary.span: 在類別中實作時，傳回在其上定義成員的物件。

span.span: When implemented in a class, returns the object that a member is defined on.

returns.span: 在其上定義成員的物件。

span.span: The object that a member is defined on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個包裝物件都會包含一個成員 (欄位、屬性或方法) 的資訊，連同成員定義所在之具現化物件的複本。Each wrapped object contains the information for one member (field, property, or method), together with a copy of the instantiated object that the member is defined on. 這樣可讓其他未包含成員的物件進行儲存，然後就像傳回自己的值一般傳回其值。This enables other objects that do not contain the member to store it and then return its value as if it were their own.
